It is said that Lada Gart used this rock where
our fathers slept as a base to fight monsters
and build a nation of peace and prosperity.

26820.<left>この先 危険地帯！ ベコン渓谷の中でも\n<left>もっとも恐ろし:

41047.<pc>は\n石碑に記された 文字を読んだ。\n<bw_clear>\n<cen:
You read the words on the stone monument.
<bw_clear>
Old Orseco Arena was rebuilt in honor of King
Lada Gart, founder of Gartlant, who is
enshrined at The Flame as the god of war.

41248.<left>この先 恐ろしき魔物たちが 生息する地。\n<left>最奥にある:
<left>Terrible monsters live beyond this point.
<left>If you want to get to Garaga Hole at the far
<left>end, you must be fully prepared.

41353.<pc>は\n石碑に刻まれた文字を読んだ。\n<br>\nかような時代に この世:
You read the words engraved on the stone monument.
Do not lament that you were born into this world in such a time as this. To live in any age is to be bathed in God's favor. O Children
of the House of God! Love God. And to our king, Gamilgo, who is equal to the gods in nobility, we extend our eternal adoration and
gratitude. Even after the death of the king, the shadow of the dead does not seem to disappear from around us. But still... our
today is a day of sacrifice for our King. We must never forget to be grateful for every moment we are alive...

44825.<left>返事がない……。\n<left>誰かが作った 雪だるまのようだ。:

<left>At this collapsed church in Glen West,
<left>you hear an otherworldly song...
<left>it's scribbled in the corner of this board.

45533.<center>燃える鉄を打ち 剣となせ！\n<center>武器鍛冶ギルドは:
Strike the burning iron and make a sword!

45534.<left>集え グレン城へ！\n<left>果てなき荒野の続く 百戦の地が\n:

45535.<center>眠れる勇気を 呼び覚ましたいツワモノよ！\n<center>いざ:
I want to awaken your sleeping courage.

～ Gert Strait Chamber of Commerce

45536.<center>茶色の とろけるボディに つぶらな瞳。\n<center>キュー:
She has a brown melting body with cute, round
eyes. That cute girl's name is Choco-God!
Before you know it, you'll be hooked. ♪

Gartlant Famous Places Guide

<left>of the castle, is said to ward off evil.

45538.<left>大地の箱舟は 朝も夜も\n<left>運休することなく 皆さまを\n:

45542.<left>ようこそ ガートラント城へ！\n<left>大地を育む 雄大な自然の:

<left>Our nation welcomes those who have a heart as

45543.<left>ガートラント中央路走り隊 隊員募集！\n<left>広くて 長～い:

of your youth along Gartlant Central Road?

start moving at any second stares at you...

321997.ランジェの日記のようだ。\n<br>\n<pc> アスパ ルーイン……\n３人と:
It's Ranje's diary.
, Aspa, Ruine... Those three are still a bit rough around the edges, but have grown into fine Dragomancers.
